ErrorCode.name: IdentifierUnexpected
ErrorCode.shortDescription: An unexpected error occured in the identifier archive or UID-related classes.

ErrorCode.name: IdentifierUnavailable
ErrorCode.shortDescription: The identifier archive is not available.

ErrorCode.name: RangeUnavailable
ErrorCode.shortDescription: The UID range is not available.

ErrorCode.name: RangeLocked
ErrorCode.shortDescription: The requested operation cannot be performed with a locked range of UIDs.

ErrorCode.name: RangeUnlocked
ErrorCode.shortDescription: The requested operation cannot be performed with an unlocked (non-serialized) range of UIDs.

ErrorCode.name: RangeExhausted
ErrorCode.shortDescription: The UID range is full and no more UIDs can be delivered.
